participant_1.background:
I am terrified of scorpions.
My father drove a car for nascar.
I have a german shepherd named barnaby.
My favorite color is grey.

participant_2.background:
I spent a decade working in the human services field.
My father used to work for home depot.
I have a son who is in junior high school.
Horror movies are my favorites.

content.text: Hey, my name is participant_1. I'm a software engineer. What do you do for a living?
I spent a decade working in the human services field, but now I'm a stay-at-home mom.
That's awesome! I bet you have a lot of stories to share.
I do! I've worked with a lot of different people and had some really interesting experiences.
There are so many to choose from, but I think my favorite is the time I met a woman who had been homeless for years. She was so resilient and positive, and she really inspired me.
That's a great story! I'm sure it was a lot of work, but it sounds like it was really rewarding.
It was! I loved helping people and making a difference in their lives.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
Me too! I love to watch horror movies.
Oh, me too! I love how they can make me feel scared and anxious.
I don't know if I have one favorite, but I really like the Conjuring movies.
Those are great! I love the atmosphere and the acting.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new one coming out.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be great.
